document_data.name: Hakahrsi chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hakahrsi chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Hakahrsi chaka was based in the coastal city of [[Sezilinta]] in central [[Durpar]].
document_data.Activity: They were rare among the chakas of the region in that they were an organization of [[halfling]]s. The Hakahrsi chaka generated wealth from grain and other foodstuffs. They were one of the newest members of the Chakas of 31 during this time.
